Question: Polish Investment and Trade Agency CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Polish Investment and Trade Agency (PAIH)

CES 2024 Product Highlight

 - Promotes international expansion of Polish business
 - Supports foreign direct investment into Poland
 - Aims to boost Polish exports
 - Achieved record foreign investments of over EUR 3.7 billion in 2022
 - Number of actual projects increased by more than 20%
 - Hosted the first ever Polish Pavilion at CES 2024
Summary_cn:
波兰投资与贸易机构（PAIH）

CES 2024产品亮点

- 促进波兰企业的国际扩张
- 支持对波兰的外商直接投资
- 旨在提升波兰出口业务
- 在2022年实现创纪录的超过37亿欧元外国投资
- 实际项目数量增长超过20％
- 主办CES 2024的首个波兰馆
